title: New Runewars Skins FREE for players that purchased Runes
body: What better way to send off the old Rune system then by introducing 5 or 6 new Runewars skins to accompany Runewars Renekton, along with Chroma packs for each AND...giving them away to players who Invested time and money into Legacy Runes?  Just some thoughts.
